KA.IUHCI.content: man’s propensity t enter into society is also linked to a resistance (Widerstande) > man has a desire to associate (vergesellschaften) himself w/ other men and to isolate (vereinzelnen) himself: latter resistance, in society, can come in the form of vainglory and ambition [inclination as Hang or Neigung]
KA.IUHCI.linkedContent: man’s propensity t enter into society is also linked to a resistance (Widerstande) > man has a desire to associate (vergesellschaften) himself w/ other men and to isolate (vereinzelnen) himself: latter resistance, in society, can come in the form of vainglory and ambition [inclination as Hang or Neigung]

KA.IUHCI.content: rationalizing wars [colloquially vs. philosophically] > great union of nations, united will of them all > all wars so many attempts to bring new relations about states and to form new bodies (break up the old)
KA.IUHCI.linkedContent: rationalizing wars [colloquially vs. philosophically] > great union of nations, united will of them all > all wars so many attempts to bring new relations about states and to form new bodies (break up the old)

KA.EP.content: all forms of government that are not representative are despotic > democracy always a despotism [?] [p. 444]: all want to be ruler
KA.EP.linkedContent: all forms of government that are not representative are despotic > democracy always a despotism [?] [p. 444]: all want to be ruler

KA.EP.content: can’t really deduce or observe objective final end (Endzweck) of mankind, but we must add this thought to form conception of its possibility > concept of duty toward eternal peace is a mechanism of nature [?]
KA.EP.linkedContent: can’t really deduce or observe objective final end (Endzweck) of mankind, but we must add this thought to form conception of its possibility > concept of duty toward eternal peace is a mechanism of nature [?]

KA.EP.content: we need public law > problems w/ political moralist > form over matter
KA.EP.linkedContent: we need public law > problems w/ political moralist > form over matter
